Name: Creepy Pizza Arcade
About the game: The Creepy Pizza Arcade is a spot to play mini-games based on the Creepy Pizza Podcast. Drown people as the Kelpie sticky horse, get your fortune read, battle against pizza alien invaders, and more to come! Tune in to our podcast to hear Britt educate Peter on the creepier things -- ghost stories, folklore, urban legends, cryptids, etc. -- and have a laugh! Find us on your favorite podcast app, and visit our website for more information and merch. - Britt and Peter
